DOC.HEADLINE: REP . FISH SAYS HE WON ' T RUN AGAIN , CITES CANCER
DOC.TEXT: Rep . Hamilton Fish Jr . ( R-N.Y. ) announced Tuesday that he will not seek reelection , because he has health problems.Fish , 67 , said he had planned to run again in November but changed his mind after learning that he would need treatment for prostate cancer . He also is scheduled to have a lesion removed from his lung next week .
